narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Otto Berk is a Social Worker, Clinical provider based in Forest Hills, NY. From 2018-01 through 2018-09, this provider received $166K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 399 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 99% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90876 (90876). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2018-09, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
